title: useLatest( )
description: The `useLatest` hook provides a reliable way to keep a reference to the most recent value, ensuring it updates without causing unnecessary re-renders. In this article, you'll find practical code implementations and real-world use cases, demonstrating how the custom hook can be applied in various scenarios. We'll break down the process of creating the hook, explain its key features, and provide a detailed explanation to help you understand its functionality and use.
